Room.Name: Main Courtyard - Northwest Corner
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the troop review stand, in the northwest corner of the courtyard.
Room.LongDescription: There are seats arranged in tiers here, and a place for a band to play as the troops assemble for inspection. The ladies of the castle mostly come here to show off their silks and jewelry, and the noblemen come here to show off their ladies. the squad leaders are here just to show off the troops.
